hypothesis_content.title: DOGE Post-News Momentum Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: DOGE price will experience a short-term momentum reversal (2-5% bounce) within 24 hours following a negative news-driven slide when BTC is in NEUTRAL regime and DOGE RSI(4H) falls below 30.
hypothesis_content.rationale: DOGE exhibits strong retail sentiment elasticity; oversold conditions combined with negative news often trigger quick 'buy the dip' reactions from retail traders once BTC stabilizes. The 4H RSI < 30 provides statistical edge for mean reversion in memecoins.
entry_conditions: Negative DOGE-specific news headline published within last 12 hours
BTC 1H price change between -2% and +1% (stable anchor)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: DOGE price drops further 3% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: DOGE continues to decline >5% below entry level despite BTC stability and oversold RSI, indicating structural selling pressure outweighing retail dip-buying.
